alternative: Man Who Will Never Give Up

node.description:
**04 Limited Sazabys** is a four-member punk-rock band formed in Nagoya, Japan in 2008.

The band consists of Ba/Vo [GEN](https://anilist.co/staff/351519/GEN), Gt HIROKAZ, Gt/Cho RYU-TA and Dr/Cho KOUHEI. 04LS made their major debut from Nippon Columbia with the 1st full album 'CAVU' in 2015.

**[Website](https://novelbright.jp/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/Lead0408) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Novelbright_jp) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/novelbright_jp/)**

Five-member Japanese rock band formed in 2013 and mainly active in Osaka.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Horidesk) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/horidesk/) | [Website](http://horidesk.m78.com)

Originating from Studio Pokke, currently freelance.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/吉原俊一郎)

Affiliated with studio Bihou.

**[Website](https://novelbright.jp/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/Lead0408) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Novelbright_jp) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/novelbright_jp/)**

Five-member Japanese rock band formed in 2013 and mainly active in Osaka.

**[Website](https://novelbright.jp/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/Lead0408) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Novelbright_jp) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/novelbright_jp/)**

Five-member Japanese rock band formed in 2013 and mainly active in Osaka.

[Profile (Arts Vision)](https://www.artsvision.co.jp/talent/518/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/DaiKing_boy) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/daiki_yamashita_boy/) | [Website](https://yamashitadaiki.com/)

He is affiliated with Arts Vision and was the winner of the Best Male Newcomer award at the 8th Seiyu Awards in 2014.

**[TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@MS4wLjABAAAAtXampH7X5RB5Ln_rZnPjj_uZgB2YIMYy1tMhPYeanqI) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@yudai_vo) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yudai_vo) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yudai_vo/) **

Vocalist for the Japanese rock band *[Novelbright](https://anilist.co/staff/270181)*. Takenaka founded the band in 2013 and is the only remaining original member. He is also known for his accomplishments as a whistler.

**04 Limited Sazabys** is a four-member punk-rock band formed in Nagoya, Japan in 2008.

The band consists of Ba/Vo [GEN](https://anilist.co/staff/351519/GEN), Gt HIROKAZ, Gt/Cho RYU-TA and Dr/Cho KOUHEI. 04LS made their major debut from Nippon Columbia with the 1st full album 'CAVU' in 2015.
__Birthplace:__ Atsugi City, Kanagawa Prefecture Website | Twitter | Instagram | YouTube __Saeki Yuusuke__ is a Japanese singer, songwriter, composer and lyricist.
